description: This file contains unit tests for the SQLite storage backend of an agent-based system, verifying storage creation, session management, retrieval, deletion, and filtering functionalities.

methods.name: temp_db_path
methods.description: Fixture that creates a temporary database file path for testing.

methods.name: agent_storage
methods.description: Fixture that creates a SqliteStorage instance with a unique table name for testing.

methods.name: agent_with_storage
methods.description: Fixture that creates an Agent instance with the test storage.

methods.name: test_storage_creation
methods.description: Test that the storage is created correctly and the database file exists.

methods.name: test_agent_session_storage
methods.description: Test that an agent session is properly stored and contains the expected data.

methods.name: test_multiple_interactions
methods.description: Test that multiple interactions are stored in the same session.

methods.name: test_session_retrieval_by_user
methods.description: Test retrieving sessions filtered by user ID.

methods.name: test_session_deletion
methods.description: Test deleting a session and verifying it no longer exists.

methods.name: test_get_all_session_ids
methods.description: Test retrieving all session IDs with various filters.

methods.name: test_drop_storage
methods.description: Test dropping all sessions from storage and verifying cleanup.
